posts.post_title: FS: T206 Johnson, T206 Mathewson, T213-2 Speaker, etc.
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Derek Granger
I am looking to sell the following cards at, what I believe to be, reasonable prices.  The first person to email me at h2oya311@yahoo.com saying: "I'll take it!" will get it.

GRADED:
1) T206 Walter Johnson portrait Piedmont 150 - SGC 30 (SOLD)
2) T206 Christy Mathewson portrait Sweet Cap 150 - PSA 1 (SOLD)
3) M116 Eddie Collins pastel Sporting Life - PSA 6 (SOLD)
4) T213-2 Tris Speaker - PSA 2 (SOLD)

RAW:
1) T213-1 Scoops Carey southern league - good cond (SOLD)

I will accept Paypal if you add 3% for the fees.  Otherwise, checks and money orders are perfectly acceptable.

Thanks for looking, ~Derek 

*edited on 1/13 - THANKS TO ALL WHO PURCHASED FROM ME!!!*

[IMG]http://i267.photobucket.com/albums/ii316/h2oya311/1909T206Johnson.jpg[/IMG]
